pull.title: refactor: Add and use EnsureConnman in rpc code
pull.body: This removes the 10 occurrences of `throw JSONRPCError(RPC_CLIENT_P2P_DISABLED, "Error: Peer-to-peer functionality missing or disabled");` and replaces them with `EnsureConnman`.
